調.definition: to harmonize; to reconcile; to blend; to suit well; to adjust; to regulate; to season (food); to provoke; to incite

調三窩四.definition: to sow the seeds of discord everywhere (idiom)

調任.definition: to transfer; to move to another post

調休.definition: to compensate for working on a holiday by resting on a workday; to compensate for resting on a workday by working on a holiday

調侃.definition: to ridicule; to tease; to mock; idle talk; chitchat

調停.definition: to reconcile; to mediate; to bring warring parties to agreement; to arbitrate

調價.definition: to raise or lower the price; price adjustment

調入.definition: to bring in; to call in; to transfer (a person, data); (computing) to call; to load (a subroutine etc)

調兵遣將.definition: to move an army and send a general (idiom); to deploy an army; to send a team on a task

調劑.definition: to adjust; to balance; to make up a medical prescription

調動.definition: to transfer; to maneuver (troops etc); movement of personnel; to mobilize; to bring into play

調包.definition: to steal sb's valuable item and substitute a similar-looking but worthless item; to sell a fake for the genuine article; to palm off

調升.definition: to adjust upward; to upgrade; (price) hike

調卷.definition: to consult the archives; to check the records (usually of legal proceedings)

調取.definition: to obtain (information from an archive etc)

調和.definition: harmonious; to mediate; to reconcile; mediation; to compromise; to mix; to blend; blended; to season; seasoning; to placate

調唆.definition: to provoke; to stir up (trouble); to instigate

調子.definition: tune; melody; tuning; cadence; intonation; (speech) tone

調崗.definition: to transfer an employee to another post; reassignment; also pr. [tiao2 gang3]

調幅.definition: amplitude modulation (AM); size of an adjustment

調幹.definition: to reassign a cadre; to choose a worker to be promoted to cadre

調幹生.definition: worker chosen to become a cadre and sent to complete his schooling

調度.definition: to dispatch (vehicles, staff etc); to schedule; to manage; dispatcher; scheduler

調弄.definition: to tease; to make fun of; to provoke; to stir up (trouble)

調性.definition: (music) tonality; (of an actor, company, magazine etc) style; image; tone; voice; character

調戲.definition: to take liberties with a woman; to dally; to assail a woman with obscenities

調換.definition: to exchange; to change places; to swap

調攝.definition: (literary) to nurse to health; to recuperate

調教.definition: to instruct; to teach; to train; to raise (livestock)

調整.definition: to adjust; adjustment; revision; CL:個|个[ge4]

調查.definition: investigation; inquiry; to investigate; to survey; survey; (opinion) poll; CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]

調檔.definition: to transfer a dossier; to consult a dossier

調派.definition: to send on assignment; to deploy (troops)

調準.definition: to adjust to the right value; to tune; to focus (a camera etc); to set (the date, the time) to the correct value

調理.definition: to nurse one's health; to recuperate; to take care of; to look after; to discipline; to educate; to train; to prepare food; (dialect) to make fun of; (medicine) to opsonize

調用.definition: to transfer (for a specific purpose); to allocate; (computing) to invoke (a command, an application etc)

調研.definition: to investigate and research; research; investigation

調研人員.definition: research workers; survey and research workers

調笑.definition: to tease; to poke fun at

調節.definition: to adjust; to regulate; to harmonize; to reconcile (accountancy etc)

調職.definition: to be transferred to another post; to post away

調色.definition: to blend colors; to mix colors

調虎離山.definition: to lure the tiger from its domain in the mountains (idiom); to lure an enemy away from his territory

調號.definition: tone mark on a Chinese syllable (i.e. accents on ā á ǎ à); (music) key signature

調製.definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients; to prepare according to a recipe; to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)

調解.definition: to mediate; to bring parties to an agreement

調訓.definition: to train; to care for and educate

調試.definition: to debug; to adjust components during testing; debugging

調諧.definition: harmonious; to adjust; to tune (e.g. wireless receiver); to bring into harmony

調謔.definition: to make fun of; to mock

調資.definition: wage adjustment; to raise or lower wages

調車場.definition: (railroad) classification yard; marshalling yard; shunting yard

調轉.definition: to reassign sb to a different job; to turn around; to change direction; to make a U turn

調遣.definition: to dispatch; to assign; a dispatch

調適.definition: to adapt (to an environment etc); to make sth suitable; adaptation; adjustment; adaptive

調遷.definition: to transfer; to move; to shift

調門兒.definition: erhua variant of 調門|调门[diao4 men2]

調降.definition: (Tw) to lower (prices, interest rates etc); to reduce; to cut

調集.definition: to summon; to muster; to assemble

調養.definition: to take care of (sb's health); to nurse
